Terms of Service

  • Company: RK Oxygen
  • GSTIN: 09ABAFR4114P1ZX
  • Constitution: Partnership
  • Principal Place of Business: 85, RK Palace, Gangaprasad Road, Rakabganj, Lucknow – 226018, Uttar Pradesh
  • Additional Place of Business: K-1A, Sector 15, GIDA, Gorakhpur – 273209, Uttar Pradesh
  • Partners: Ruhil Jaiswal, Ajay Kumar Jaiswal, Kushagra Jaiswal

1. Introduction

By making a purchase or payment through our platform, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully before proceeding.

2. Services

We supply industrial gases, welding electrodes, and related products. All transactions are subject to availability and confirmation.

3. Pricing & Payments

All prices are exclusive of GST unless stated otherwise. Payments must be made in full at the time of purchase via secure payment gateways.

4. Delivery

Orders will be processed and delivered as per mutually agreed timelines. Delays due to transport or unforeseen issues will be communicated.

5. Refunds & Cancellations

Refunds and cancellations are governed by our Refund & Cancellation Policy.

6. Limitation of Liability

We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages beyond our reasonable control.

7. Governing Law

These terms are governed by the laws of India. Disputes fall under the jurisdiction of Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh courts.
